title: Finally did it, got to Plat on my Teemo only account
body:
Finally got to plat on my Teemo only account (unless teemo is banned/picked or I go into a crazy lane like jungle)
feels good.

replies.body:
/#thankyousatan!

Good work. You are evil incarnate for doing this, but good work.


Aiming for diamond next or picking a new main to try to climb with?

I would love to aim for Diamond. 
have to finish the Faceless quests somehow.

Diamond would be the highest I have ever been on any account. (was only plat last season on my main account, so it's not even like I am smurfing).

Congratz....

How the fuck did you not die from boredom? I played a bit and I shit you not, I literally fell asleep while playing him a couple times. He's exciting in lane but when lane phase is over, he is boring as shit to play.
But how on earth you can win that much as Teemo...

it's not really about what champ you play, alot of it is just about learning mechanics/macroplays for just the game in general (aka warding, learning when to back, learning how to cs, learning how to not continue feeding after you died a few times already)
I am not saying I am an expert (heck I am only plat), But I learned that sometimes you just have to learn how to not feed in the early game to win.

lots of times jungles will focus me though too which is odd, guess they just hate teemo. But my shrooms are still gonna do damage even if I am 0/10/0

https://i.imgur.com/8b58e2q.png[]

but it wasn't teemo only

there are some games where teemo is banned, picked before me, or I go somewhere like jungle.
can't always be teemo, as you see the numbers played on those characters are less than 10 each, while teemo is in the hundreds.

Edit: I play teemo on this account, but that doesn't mean I am gonna do something -super- dumb like teemo jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=God Hates Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=M3XBuEb8,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-05-09T01:06:26.007+0000)
>
> there are some games where teemo is banned, picked before me, or I go somewhere like jungle.
> can't always be teemo, as you see the numbers played on those characters are less than 10 each, while teemo is in the hundreds.
> 
> Edit: I play teemo on this account, but that doesn't mean I am gonna do something -super- dumb like teemo jungle.

Then its not teemo only {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

nit picking does you no good.
Teemo only 99% of the time. 
I am not gonna dodge games when teemo is banned just to maintain 100% teemo status, even IPav (Challenger teemo 1 trick) doesn't do that.

> [{quoted}](name=ShirleyfG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=M3XBuEb8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-05-09T00:12:04.386+0000)
> but it wasn't teemo only

"unless teemo is banned/picked or I go into a crazy lane like jungle"
